abilities.name: Blaze
abilities.description: When this Pokémon's HP falls to 1/3 or below, its Fire-type moves have a 50% chance to lower its temperature.

abilities.name: Solar Power
abilities.description: The effectiveness of the Pokémon's Fire-type moves is halved in sunny weather.

evolutions.name: Charmeleon
evolutions.description: Charmeleon is a Fire-type Pokémon that evolves from Charmander at level 16.

evolutions.name: Charmander
evolutions.description: Charmander is a Fire-type Pokémon that evolves into Charmeleon at level 16.
